ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Does heritrix support craw a web which has been crawled before?

vretr wrote:
>
> In heritrix 1.9 ,
> Does heritrix support craw a web which has been crawled before?
>



Yes (If I understand you correctly).  The second time it runs, it has no 
knowledge of the first run and will happily travel the same path as the 
previous crawl.
Yours,
St.Ack

>
